front.title: Recommendation for block cipher modes of operation

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This publication approves the XTS-AES mode of the AES algorithm by reference to IEEE Std 1619-2007, subject to one additional requirement, as an option for protecting the confidentiality of data on storage devices. The mode does not provide authentication of the data or its source.
